question_text: What would be the impact of a prolonged outage affecting several root server clusters?
answer_options: Only country code domains would be inaccessible
All DNS records would be lost permanently
New DNS lookups could fail if local caches expire
Existing DNS entries would stop resolving immediately
correct_answer: New DNS lookups could fail if local caches expire
explanation: Cached DNS entries allow continued resolution, but once expired, failed access to root servers would prevent new lookups for uncached FQDNs.
